content: Write a 3-sentence story that follows the structure "once upon a time, every day, until one day".

Once upon a time, in a quaint little village nestled between rolling hills, there lived a young girl named Elara who dreamed of touching the stars. Every day, she diligently crafted small paper stars, sending them afloat on the river, hoping they would somehow reach the sky. Until one day, a mysterious traveler gifted her a magical telescope, revealing that her stars had indeed found their place among the constellations, twinkling back at her.
